testcase.name: S.1.5.(a) - Taxonomy entry point selection
testcase.description: An instance document MUST reference only one entry point schema file ("module"), with the full absolute URL, as specified in the relevant EIOPA Solvency II XBRL Taxonomy and be applicable for the reference date of the instance document.

variation.description: XBRL instance with correct full URL of module referenced by schemaRef.
XBRL instance with correct full URLs of modules referenced by two schemaRefs.
XBRL instance with correct full URL of module referenced by schemaRef and a linkbaseRef to some linkbase file.
XBRL instance with schemaRef pointing to a schema file that is not any of the allowed modules.
XBRL instance with relative path to module referenced by schemaRef.
